person.persName: Gustavus "Gus" G. Slaughter, Sr. (Webster County, Kentucky, trader and postmaster)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, trader and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine "Kate" Morris in Webster County, Kentucky, on October 31, 1860. Father of Laura Slaughter, Helen Slaughter, and Gustavus Slaughter. Trader in Webster County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Webster County in 1860. Household owned nine additional enslaved persons in Webster County in 1860. Postmaster of Slaughtersville in Webster County from November 1, 1860, to August 8, 1865.
